spx.net

Class ImgRecvStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • spx.net.ImgRecvStream

  • public class ImgRecvStream
extends java.lang.Object
    ImgRecvStream class for receiving a stream of images from an image sender stream.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ImgRecvStream.ImageFn 
      static interface  ImgRecvStream.MetadataFn

      ImgRecvStream(ImgSendStreamInfo streamInfo)
      Constructor - Sets address in packet decoders and install handlers for image packets and metadata packets.

    • Method Summary

      Close the object and tidy up.

      Get the image buffer containing the complete image of size width * height.

      Get the height of the received image in pixels.

      Get the width of the received image in pixels.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImgRecvStream

        public ImgRecvStream(ImgSendStreamInfo streamInfo)
              throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Constructor - Sets address in packet decoders and install handlers for image packets and metadata packets.
        Parameters:
        streamInfo - Stream info object. To run the receiver, create a thread using an instance of this class and call start() on it. To stop the thread call the stop() function on this class.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If hostname cannot be found.

    • Method Detail

      • setImageChangeCallback

        public void setImageChangeCallback(ImgRecvStream.ImageFn fn)
        Install function object containing callback to call when a region of the image has been successfully received and decoded.
        Parameters:
        fn - Function object to install.

      • setMetadataCallback

        public void setMetadataCallback(ImgRecvStream.MetadataFn fn)
        Install function object containing callback to call when any piece of metadata appears as new, changes or expires.
        Parameters:
        fn - Function object to install.

      • close

        public void close()
